Serialized Form

  • Package com.mapgroup.client

    • Class com.mapgroup.client.TreeClient extends javax.swing.JApplet implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • predictionPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel predictionPanel
          Main panel of the GUI

        • emailPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel emailPanel
          Panel responsible of email sending services

        • out

          java.io.ObjectOutputStream out
          Output stream towards the server

        • in

          java.io.ObjectInputStream in
          Input stream inward the client

        • startPredictionBt

          javax.swing.JButton startPredictionBt
          Button to start the prediction

        • saveAs

          javax.swing.JButton saveAs
          Button to convert the last dataset used in a chosen format

        • answerTxt

          javax.swing.JTextField answerTxt
          Text field where user can insert the choice to continue prediction

        • msgAreaTxt

          javax.swing.JTextArea msgAreaTxt
          Area where information on the tree is displayed

        • queryLb

          javax.swing.JLabel queryLb
          Possible choices to continue prediction

        • nameDataTxt

          javax.swing.JTextField nameDataTxt
          Field with the source name of the tree (e.g. database table, name of file)

        • treeConstructionBt

          javax.swing.JButton treeConstructionBt
          Button to ask the server to build the tree for the prediction

        • continueBt

          javax.swing.JButton continueBt
          Button to continue the prediction session

        • db

          javax.swing.JRadioButton db
          Button to select a database table as source of the tree

        • file

          javax.swing.JRadioButton file
          Button to select a file of the server as source of the tree

        • upload

          javax.swing.JRadioButton upload
          Button to select a file from PC as source of the tree

        • availableFile

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> availableFile
          List of available dataset on the server

        • availableFileModel

          javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel<E> availableFileModel
          Model for the list of available dataset on the server

        • updateFileList

          javax.swing.JButton updateFileList
          Button to update the list of available dataset on the server

        • chooserLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel chooserLabel
          Label with the current selected source for the tree

        • chooserFlag

          boolean chooserFlag
          Flag that states if the file chooser window can be displayed: true if the user has chosen to upload a file, false otherwise

        • clientSocket

          java.net.Socket clientSocket
          Socket of the client

        • sessionTracker

          PredSessionTO sessionTracker
          Tracker of all the information of the last prediction

        • datasetCreated

          boolean datasetCreated
          Flag that indicates if a dataset is present in the server: false if the last prediction was on a server file, true otherwise

  • Package com.mapgroup.client.utility

    • Class com.mapgroup.client.utility.FileSender extends javax.swing.JDialog implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • outStream

          java.io.ObjectOutputStream outStream
          a specific stream needed to transfer some specific data to the server

        • fileName

          java.lang.String fileName
          the complete filename of the file that will be sent

        • s

          java.net.Socket s
          the socket which grants the communication with the client

        • progressMonitor

          javax.swing.JProgressBar progressMonitor
          a graphical component which displays download progress

        • task

          FileSender.Task task
          A background task that was executed in order to send the file

        • currException

          java.lang.Exception currException
          exception that maybe be generated in the file sending

    • Class com.mapgroup.to.PredSessionTO extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • tree

          java.lang.String tree
          The tree on which the prediction has been done

        • tracker

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> tracker
          A tracker of the choices done for each attribute (key: name of the attribute; value: choice)

        • predictedValue

          java.lang.String predictedValue
          Final result of the prediction
